overview: Frontiersman Tom Garfield and his pals endeavor to save their land from the clutches of slimy easterner Forsyth. The villain hires a bit of local muscle in the form of brutish Chris Matson, but he's no match for our hero.
tagline: Blazin' Six-Guns Bark the Waterloo of the West's Toughest Killers!
title: West of Abilene
